title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.19 - Reimbursements of expenses to participants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.19 - Reimbursements of expenses to participants

State Regulations

All participants and officials in contests or exhibitions
other than a main event or co-main event who were unable to perform because of
weather conditions, a rearrangement, cancellation or shortening of a contest or
exhibition, shall have such of their expenses and other fees paid by the
promoter as the Commission may direct. Notes

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
